Okay, amra age kotha boli niye tumi kivabe work ar school balance korchile ar shob. Ekhon specifically ki problem hocche, mone hocche ajke tumi ektu beshi distressed.

okay, ekoi grade pabar jonno beshi kosto korchile?

Amar teachers mone kore ami valo kori. Actually ami assignments e valo feedback pachi, kintu mone hocche ami nishchoi korte chai ami valo kori. Ami details niye beshi focus kori, nirdesh gulo clear kore bujhte chai, perfectly korte chai jemon instructor chai, karon ami bhoy pai, jodi ami clear na hoi assignment ta ki, tahole hote pare ami thik vabe korte parbo na.

right, mone hocche ami teacher ke email kori, prai obsessively, assignment clarify korte ar nishchoi korte chai je ami class e valo kori ki na.

amar kache, A minus hote pare ami okay hobo, kintu tar niche, amar kache B, B minus, B, B plus sob B, ar eta A na.
toh B grade pele ki mane hobe tomake?

mane hobe ami joto kosto korte pari ni, ar kichu korte partam better korar jonno, ami slack korechi, nirdesh gulo thik vabe porini, enough response dei ni, paper ta enough lomba kori ni. Ami enough kori ni.

Ekhon je mone hocche, amader program e same students chilo. Kintu ei semester e ekjon new student esheche, ar tumi mention korecho, mone hocche she amake onek stress dey.
